title: mushroom gravy
ingredients: 3 Cups vegetable broth (Better than Bouillon preferred)
instructions: Heat olive oil in a large skillet over medium heat.
Add shallot and cook until soft, about 4 minutes.
Add mushrooms and cook until softened, about 8â€“10 minutes.
Stir in tamari, garlic, thyme, and rosemary.
Sprinkle flour over the mushrooms and stir for 1 minute.
Add broth and simmer until thickened, whisking often, about 20 minutes.
Season with salt and pepper to taste.
